Package eddy.lang.parser

Provides classes to parse and compile Eddy policies.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CompilationProperties
    Describes property names for compilation statistics.
    CompilerConstants
    Defines the compiler constants, including default namespaces.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionParser
    Translates non-modal statement fragments into Action objects.
    Compilation
    Describes the Compiler result of a given Policy.
    Compiler
    Translates Policy objects into Compilation objects.
    CompilerFactory
    Provides a factory method to create multiple Compiler objects.
    Logger
    Provides simple logging facilities across parser, compiler and analysis classes.
    Parser
    Translates policy text into a Policy object.
    RoleParser
    Translates statement fragments into Role objects.
    Tokenizer
    Tokenizes policy text into symbols for parsing in a Parser object.
    Tokenizer.Token
    Describes a tokenized policy fragment obtained by the Tokenizer.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ParseException
    Provides exception handling due to parser and compiler errors at runtime.

Package eddy.lang.parser Description

Provides classes to parse and compile Eddy policies.
